question: Which state has distributed free laptops to Plus Two (+2) meritorious students under the ‘Biju Sashaktikaran Yojana’?
explanation: Odisha government on December 6,2019 distributed free laptops to Plus Two (+2) meritorious students under the \'Biju Sashaktikaran Yojana\' as part of their government\'s youth policy in Odisha. The state government had started distributing free laptops with the aim to inspire and upgrade the skill of the young people of the state. 90,203 students have been covered under the scheme. The top 15,000 students from different streams were selected on a merit basis at the state level.
